name: War Horn
base_effect: Sound a war horn rallying nearby allies and granting them Major Force for 10 seconds increasing Critical Damage by 20%. Also grants Minor Fortitude, Minor Endurance, and Minor Intellect increasing Health, Stamina, and Magicka Recovery.

name: Aggressive Horn
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 4 + War Horn IV
base_effect: Sound a war horn rallying nearby allies and granting them Major Force for 10 seconds increasing Critical Damage by 20%. Also grants Minor Fortitude, Minor Endurance, and Minor Intellect. Allies gain empower increasing damage of next Light Attack by 70%.

name: Sturdy Horn
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 4 + War Horn IV
base_effect: Sound a war horn rallying nearby allies and granting them Major Force for 10 seconds increasing Critical Damage by 20%. Also grants Minor Fortitude, Minor Endurance, and Minor Intellect. Additionally grants Major Resolve increasing Physical and Spell Resistance.
buff_debuff_granted: Major Force|Minor Fortitude|Minor Endurance|Minor Intellect|Major Resolve

name: Rapid Maneuver
base_effect: Rally yourself and nearby group members granting Major Gallop increasing Mount Speed by 30%. Also grants Major Expedition increasing Movement Speed by 30% for the duration. Effect ends if you cast an ability or attack.

name: Retreating Maneuver
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 2 + Rapid Maneuver IV
base_effect: Rally yourself and nearby group members granting Major Gallop increasing Mount Speed by 30%. Also grants Major Expedition increasing Movement Speed by 30%. Additionally grants immunity to snares and immobilizations for duration.

name: Charging Maneuver
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 2 + Rapid Maneuver IV
base_effect: Rally yourself and nearby group members granting Major Gallop increasing Mount Speed by 30%. Also grants Major Expedition increasing Movement Speed by 30%. The speed effect no longer ends when you use an ability or attack.

name: Vigor
base_effect: Let loose a battle cry, instilling determination to you and nearby allies and healing all targets over the duration. The healing is based on your Max Health.

name: Echoing Vigor
base_effect: Let loose a battle cry, instilling determination to you and nearby allies and healing all targets over the duration. Increased radius to 12 meters allowing more allies to benefit.

name: Resolving Vigor
base_effect: Let loose a battle cry, instilling determination and healing yourself over the duration. Now only affects yourself but with significantly increased healing power for self-sustain.

name: Caltrops
base_effect: Hurl caltrops at target location dealing Physical Damage over time to enemies in the area and applying Minor Maim reducing their damage done. Enemies in area are snared by 50%.

name: Anti-Cavalry Caltrops
base_effect: Hurl caltrops at target location dealing Physical Damage over time to enemies in the area and applying Minor Maim. Also dismounts mounted enemies who enter the area. Enemies in area are snared by 50%.

name: Razor Caltrops
base_effect: Hurl sharpened caltrops at target location dealing increased Physical Damage over time to enemies in the area and applying Minor Maim. Enemies in area are snared by 50%. Enhanced bleed damage.

name: Continuous Attack
base_effect: Grants Minor Gallop at all times increasing your Mount Speed. The bonus is always active regardless of location or activity.

rank_progression.2: Minor Gallop (15% Mount Speed) + Stamina Recovery in Cyrodiil

name: Reach
base_effect: Increases the range of long-range abilities by up to 2 meters. Applies to abilities that have a range of 20 meters or greater. Useful for siege warfare and ranged combat.

name: Combat Frenzy
base_effect: Grants up to 20 Ultimate when you kill a player in PvP combat. This bonus only applies in Cyrodiil and Battlegrounds. Does not trigger from NPC kills.

name: Barrier
base_effect: Invoke a protective barrier to shield yourself and nearby group members gaining a powerful damage shield that absorbs damage for the duration based on your Max Magicka.

name: Reviving Barrier
base_effect: Invoke a protective barrier to shield yourself and nearby group members gaining a damage shield. When the shield expires or is destroyed it heals all affected allies based on remaining shield strength.

rank_progression.2: Heals on shield expire, increased strength

name: Replenishing Barrier
base_effect: Invoke a protective barrier to shield yourself and nearby group members gaining a damage shield. You restore Magicka over time for each ally affected by the shield providing group sustain.

rank_progression.2: Restore Magicka per ally, increased strength

name: Siege Shield
base_effect: Create a protective dome at target location shielding allies from enemy siege weapon damage. Allies inside take 55% less damage from siege weapons and area of effect attacks.

name: Propelling Shield
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 2 + Siege Shield IV
base_effect: Create a protective dome at target location shielding allies from enemy siege damage. Allies inside take 55% less damage from siege. Additionally increases your siege weapon damage by 15%.

name: Siege Weapon Shield
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 2 + Siege Shield IV
base_effect: Create a protective dome at target location shielding allies from enemy siege damage. Allies inside take 55% less damage from siege. Increased radius to 10 meters for better coverage.

name: Purge
base_effect: Cleanse yourself and nearby group members removing up to 2 negative effects. This ability is essential for removing crowd control and damage over time effects in PvP combat.

name: Cleanse
base_effect: Cleanse yourself and nearby group members removing up to 2 negative effects. Additionally heals all affected allies for a moderate amount based on your Max Magicka.

name: Efficient Purge
base_effect: Cleanse yourself and nearby group members removing up to 2 negative effects. Significantly reduced Magicka cost making it sustainable for frequent use in prolonged engagements.

name: Magicka Aid
base_effect: Increases Magicka Recovery while in a group. This passive helps sustain Magicka when supporting allies in PvP combat. Stacks with other recovery bonuses.

name: Combat Medic
base_effect: Increases healing done to group members in PvP. Does not affect self-healing. Essential for dedicated healer builds in Cyrodiil and Battlegrounds.

name: Battle Resurrection
base_effect: Reduces the time required to resurrect fallen players. This is crucial in PvP where getting allies back into the fight quickly can turn the tide of battle.

name: Tactician
base_effect: While Emperor: Reduces all ability costs by 20%. This massive cost reduction allows for extended combat effectiveness. Former Emperors retain a weaker version of this bonus.

name: Authority
base_effect: While Emperor: Increases Ultimate generation by 200%. This dramatically increases how quickly you can use ultimate abilities. Former Emperors retain a weaker version of this bonus.

name: Domination
base_effect: While Emperor: Increases Magicka and Stamina Recovery by 100%. This doubles your resource regeneration. Former Emperors retain a weaker version of this bonus.

name: Emperor
base_effect: While Emperor: Increases Max Magicka, Max Stamina, and Max Health by 100%. This doubles all three resource pools. Former Emperors retain a weaker version of this bonus.

name: Monarch
base_effect: While Emperor: Increases Healing Received and Damage Done by 100%. This doubles your damage output and healing received. Former Emperors retain a weaker version of this bonus.

name: Magicka Detonation
base_effect: Charge yourself with explosive Magicka for 5 seconds. When the effect ends you detonate dealing Magic Damage to all nearby enemies. Damage increases based on how many enemies are hit.

name: Proximity Detonation
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 8 + Magicka Detonation IV
base_effect: Charge yourself with explosive Magicka for 5 seconds. When the effect ends you detonate dealing Magic Damage. Now deals more damage when closer to enemies for devastating point-blank explosions.

rank_progression.2: Increased damage at close range, reduced cost

name: Inevitable Detonation
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 8 + Magicka Detonation IV
base_effect: Charge yourself with explosive Magicka for 5 seconds. When the effect ends you detonate dealing Magic Damage. Now ignores damage shields allowing the explosion to penetrate defensive abilities.

name: Guard
base_effect: Guard an ally and transfer 30% of the damage they take to you as Physical Damage. The effect ends if you and the guarded ally become separated by 15 meters. Toggle ability.

name: Mystic Guard
base_effect: Guard an ally and transfer 30% of the damage they take to you as Magic Damage. Also grants Minor Vitality to your guarded ally increasing their healing received by 8%.

rank_progression.2: Magic damage, grants Minor Vitality, reduced cost

name: Stalwart Guard
base_effect: Guard an ally and transfer 30% of the damage they take to you as Physical Damage. Converts to Stamina cost. Also grants Minor Force to your guarded ally increasing critical damage by 10%.

rank_progression.2: Stamina cost, grants Minor Force, reduced cost

name: Power Bash
base_effect: Slam the enemy with a power bash dealing Physical Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. Stun is broken by damage. Requires a shield equipped.

name: Dizzying Swing
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 9 + Power Bash IV
base_effect: Slam the enemy with a power bash dealing Physical Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. Also applies Off Balance to the enemy making them vulnerable to heavy attacks.

name: Reverberating Bash
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 9 + Power Bash IV
base_effect: Slam the enemy with a power bash dealing Physical Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. Stun duration is extended and now remains even when the target takes damage.

rank_progression.2: Stun persists through damage, reduced cost

name: Revealing Flare
base_effect: Fire a flare at target location illuminating the area and revealing stealthed enemies for 5 seconds. Revealed enemies cannot return to stealth while in the area.

name: Lingering Flare
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 9 + Revealing Flare IV
base_effect: Fire a flare at target location illuminating the area and revealing stealthed enemies. Duration is doubled to 10 seconds providing extended area denial against stealth players.

name: Scorching Flare
unlock_method: Alliance War Rank 9 + Revealing Flare IV
base_effect: Fire a flare at target location illuminating the area and revealing stealthed enemies. Also deals Flame Damage over time to enemies in the area adding offensive utility.

rank_progression.2: Deals fire damage over time, reduced cost

name: Warhorn
base_effect: Sound your warhorn granting yourself Major Brutality and Major Sorcery increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 12 seconds. Essential buff for any damage dealer.

name: Hardened Warhorn
base_effect: Sound your warhorn granting yourself Major Brutality and Major Sorcery increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%. Also grants a damage shield that absorbs damage based on your Max Health.

name: Potent Warhorn
base_effect: Sound your warhorn granting yourself Major Brutality and Major Sorcery increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20%. Extended duration to 15 seconds for longer uptime.

name: Nourishing Barrier
base_effect: Restores Magicka to you whenever you apply a damage shield to yourself or an ally. This provides excellent sustain for builds that frequently use damage shields.

name: Aggressive Assault
base_effect: Increases damage done with Assault abilities by a percentage. Applies to all active Assault skills including Caltrops, Vigor heals, and detonation abilities.

name: Defensive Maneuvers
base_effect: Reduces damage taken from siege weapons and area of effect attacks while in Cyrodiil. Essential passive for surviving large-scale PvP encounters.
